texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1 This refers to OO-OSEC-2024-2801 dated November 19 2024, designating an Assistant Secretary for Finance as a supplement to the DepEd Order 015, $ 2024 on the Revised  Designation of the Undersecretaries and Secretaries to the Strands and Functional Areas of Responsibilities and Revised Signing Authorities on Human Resource Actions.
texts.text: 1 This refers to OO-OSEC-2024-2801 dated November 19 2024, designating an Assistant Secretary for Finance as a supplement to the DepEd Order 015, $ 2024 on the Revised  Designation of the Undersecretaries and Secretaries to the Strands and Functional Areas of Responsibilities and Revised Signing Authorities on Human Resource Actions.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2 Therefore, in exigency of service and for the efficiency of operations; this DepEd Order (DO) is issued to partially amend the signing authorities stipulated in the Annex C of the DO 001, 2023 Or Revised Designation of Undersecretaries and Assistant Secretaries to their Strands and Functional Areas of Responsibilities and Revised Signing Authorities.
texts.text: 2 Therefore, in exigency of service and for the efficiency of operations; this DepEd Order (DO) is issued to partially amend the signing authorities stipulated in the Annex C of the DO 001, 2023 Or Revised Designation of Undersecretaries and Assistant Secretaries to their Strands and Functional Areas of Responsibilities and Revised Signing Authorities.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3 The amended provisions are enclosed as Annex "A" in bold and underlined fonts.
texts.text: 3 The amended provisions are enclosed as Annex "A" in bold and underlined fonts.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4 This Order amends specific provisions under DO 001 2023, provided that all other provisions not coverned by this Order shall continue to be in effect. However, this Order may be amended or revised, as necessary, by the DepEd Secretary .
texts.text: 4 This Order amends specific provisions under DO 001 2023, provided that all other provisions not coverned by this Order shall continue to be in effect. However, this Order may be amended or revised, as necessary, by the DepEd Secretary .

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5 This Order shall take effect immediately and shall remain in force until further orders. Certified of this Order shall be registered with the Office of the National Administrative Register (ONAR) at the University of the Philippines Law Center (UP LC), UP Diliman, Quezon copies City .
texts.text: 5 This Order shall take effect immediately and shall remain in force until further orders. Certified of this Order shall be registered with the Office of the National Administrative Register (ONAR) at the University of the Philippines Law Center (UP LC), UP Diliman, Quezon copies City .

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6 For more information, please contact the Office of the Undersecretary for Finance through email at usec financebpm@deped gov ph or at telephone number (02) 8633-9432
texts.text: 6 For more information, please contact the Office of the Undersecretary for Finance through email at usec financebpm@deped gov ph or at telephone number (02) 8633-9432

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7 Immediate dissemination of and strict compliance with this Order is directed.
texts.text: 7 Immediate dissemination of and strict compliance with this Order is directed.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: SIGNING AUTHORITIES FOR FINANCIAL MATTERS IN THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION
texts.text: SIGNING AUTHORITIES FOR FINANCIAL MATTERS IN THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A. WORK AND FINANCIAL PLAN (WFP)
texts.text: A. WORK AND FINANCIAL PLAN (WFP)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Work and Financial Plan (WFP) is an annual operational plan that details the office's planned programs, outputs, and activities   including the timelines and budgetary requirements based on an uploaded Expenditure Matrix (EM) in the Program Management Information System (PMIS) It guides budget execution by outlining the monthly physical, obligation, and disbursement plans. The following signing authorities should be observed for the WFP:
texts.text: The Work and Financial Plan (WFP) is an annual operational plan that details the office's planned programs, outputs, and activities   including the timelines and budgetary requirements based on an uploaded Expenditure Matrix (EM) in the Program Management Information System (PMIS) It guides budget execution by outlining the monthly physical, obligation, and disbursement plans. The following signing authorities should be observed for the WFP:

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: i. Central Office
texts.text: i. Central Office

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ii. Regional Office
texts.text: ii. Regional Office

texts.orig: iii. Schools Division Office
texts.text: iii. Schools Division Office

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: B. ACTIVITY REQUEST (AR), AUTHORITY TO CONDUCT (ATC) AND AUTHORITY TO PROCURE (ATP)/AUTHORITY TO ENGAGE (ATE)/ PURCHASE REQUEST
texts.text: B. ACTIVITY REQUEST (AR), AUTHORITY TO CONDUCT (ATC) AND AUTHORITY TO PROCURE (ATP)/AUTHORITY TO ENGAGE (ATE)/ PURCHASE REQUEST

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Except as provided in the subsequent Items (2 and 3) hereof, programs, activities, and projects to be undertaken consistent with the approved Work and Financial Plan (WFP) for the current proceed upon approval of the Activity Request (AR) or the Authority to Conduct (ATC) that was prepared for the purpose. The AR or ATC, as the case may shall be prepared in accordance with the authorities indicated in the following table: year may be,
texts.text: Except as provided in the subsequent Items (2 and 3) hereof, programs, activities, and projects to be undertaken consistent with the approved Work and Financial Plan (WFP) for the current proceed upon approval of the Activity Request (AR) or the Authority to Conduct (ATC) that was prepared for the purpose. The AR or ATC, as the case may shall be prepared in accordance with the authorities indicated in the following table: year may be,

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: i. Central Office (AR/ATC)
texts.text: i. Central Office (AR/ATC)

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Authority to Procure (ATP) /Authority to Engage (ATE) / Purchase Request (PR)
texts.text: Authority to Procure (ATP) /Authority to Engage (ATE) / Purchase Request (PR)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Procurement projects and/or activities that are incorporated in the approved WFP, or Annual Implementation Plan (AIP) where applicable, and in the approved Annual Procurement Plan (APP), shall be undertaken upon the approval of the Authority to Procure (ATP) or Authority to Engage (For   Highly Technical Consultant) or PR,   prepared in accordance with the prescribed form and observing the following signing authorities:
texts.text: Procurement projects and/or activities that are incorporated in the approved WFP, or Annual Implementation Plan (AIP) where applicable, and in the approved Annual Procurement Plan (APP), shall be undertaken upon the approval of the Authority to Procure (ATP) or Authority to Engage (For   Highly Technical Consultant) or PR,   prepared in accordance with the prescribed form and observing the following signing authorities:

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: i. Central Office
texts.text: i. Central Office

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ii. Regional, Schools Division, and Schools
texts.text: ii. Regional, Schools Division, and Schools

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The ATP/ ATE-HTC shall be prepared for each procurement activity or project and must be strictly in accordance with the   approved WFP and the approved APP or a Supplemental WFP and a Supplemental  APP; or in the case of the field offices or schools, in accordance with the approved WFP / Annual Implementation Plan and the APP for the current year of the office / school concerned.
texts.text: The ATP/ ATE-HTC shall be prepared for each procurement activity or project and must be strictly in accordance with the   approved WFP and the approved APP or a Supplemental WFP and a Supplemental  APP; or in the case of the field offices or schools, in accordance with the approved WFP / Annual Implementation Plan and the APP for the current year of the office / school concerned.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: C. BIDDING DOCUMENTS and OTHER PROCUREMENT-RELATED   DOCUMENTS, CORESPONDENCE OR NOTICES
texts.text: C. BIDDING DOCUMENTS and OTHER PROCUREMENT-RELATED   DOCUMENTS, CORESPONDENCE OR NOTICES

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Bidding Documents, Request for Quotations, Bid Bulletins, correspondences, notices and other documents issued in connection with the conduct of a procurement activity or proceeding shall be signed and issued by the Bids and Awards Committee (BAC) concerned, through the Chairperson (or in his /her absence, the Vice Chairperson) or by the Events Assistance and Services Unit (EASU),through the EASU Procurement Committee (or in his /her absence, the Vice-Chairperson;, if applicable) .
texts.text: Bidding Documents, Request for Quotations, Bid Bulletins, correspondences, notices and other documents issued in connection with the conduct of a procurement activity or proceeding shall be signed and issued by the Bids and Awards Committee (BAC) concerned, through the Chairperson (or in his /her absence, the Vice Chairperson) or by the Events Assistance and Services Unit (EASU),through the EASU Procurement Committee (or in his /her absence, the Vice-Chairperson;, if applicable) .

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For projects awarded through Procurement, the Officials, as designated below, are hereby given full authority to approve and issue the Resolution to Award (RTA) and the Notice to Award (NOA) on behalf of the Secretary , as Head of the Procuring Entity (HoPE):
texts.text: For projects awarded through Procurement, the Officials, as designated below, are hereby given full authority to approve and issue the Resolution to Award (RTA) and the Notice to Award (NOA) on behalf of the Secretary , as Head of the Procuring Entity (HoPE):

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: i. Central Office
texts.text: i. Central Office

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The foregoing enumeration of authorized approving and issuing officials based on their respective thresholds shall to projects covering single lots, or project with an RTA and corresponding NOA apply
texts.text: The foregoing enumeration of authorized approving and issuing officials based on their respective thresholds shall to projects covering single lots, or project with an RTA and corresponding NOA apply

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For a project covering multiple lots with corresponding NOAs under an RTA, the approving and issuing official with the highest amount involved or threshold shall be the signatory of the RTA and the NOAs.
texts.text: For a project covering multiple lots with corresponding NOAs under an RTA, the approving and issuing official with the highest amount involved or threshold shall be the signatory of the RTA and the NOAs.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: foregoing enumeration of authorized approving/ signingofficials based on their respective thresholds shall apply to projects covering single lots, or project with RTA and corresponding NOA and contract_ The an
texts.text: foregoing enumeration of authorized approving/ signingofficials based on their respective thresholds shall apply to projects covering single lots, or project with RTA and corresponding NOA and contract_ The an

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For a project covering multiple lots with corresponding NOAs and contracts under an RTA, the approving/ signing official with the highest amount involved or threshold who signed the RTA and the NOAs, shall also sign the contracts POs / MOAs.
texts.text: For a project covering multiple lots with corresponding NOAs and contracts under an RTA, the approving/ signing official with the highest amount involved or threshold who signed the RTA and the NOAs, shall also sign the contracts POs / MOAs.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: ii. Regional Offices, Schools Division Offices, and Schools
texts.text: ii. Regional Offices, Schools Division Offices, and Schools

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A procurement Contract, PO, MOA, or agreement in whatsoever form, shall be issued a Notice to Proceed (NTP) by the same official authorized to sign the said Contract, PO, MOA, or agreement in whatsoever form
texts.text: A procurement Contract, PO, MOA, or agreement in whatsoever form, shall be issued a Notice to Proceed (NTP) by the same official authorized to sign the said Contract, PO, MOA, or agreement in whatsoever form

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Contract time or delivery suspension, work suspension, amendment to order , variation order, other forms of amendment, or modification to the agreements, and other incidents of contract implementation, including all correspondence and notices arising therefrom; shall be issued by the same official authorized to sign the Contract, PO MOA, or by   agreement in whatsoever   form, with recommendations from the project owner / implementing unit, without prejudice to the prerogative of the lead ExeCom official concerned or the Secretary to review reverse, or modify the same, when necessary .
texts.text: Contract time or delivery suspension, work suspension, amendment to order , variation order, other forms of amendment, or modification to the agreements, and other incidents of contract implementation, including all correspondence and notices arising therefrom; shall be issued by the same official authorized to sign the Contract, PO MOA, or by   agreement in whatsoever   form, with recommendations from the project owner / implementing unit, without prejudice to the prerogative of the lead ExeCom official concerned or the Secretary to review reverse, or modify the same, when necessary .

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Procurement Strand, through the Undersecretary for Procurement may issue allowed forms or instruments of procurement agreements
texts.text: The Procurement Strand, through the Undersecretary for Procurement may issue allowed forms or instruments of procurement agreements

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: E. AUTHORITY TO DRAW CASH ADVANCE
texts.text: E. AUTHORITY TO DRAW CASH ADVANCE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Requests for  Authority to Draw Cash Advance (ADCA) shall be   supported by an approved AR or ATC and APP for the year of the office concerned, as well as the review and evaluation of the  Accounting   Division / Unit / Section on the   compliance with applicable rules and regulations on granting of cash advance. The ADCA shall be signed by the following DepEd officials:
texts.text: Requests for  Authority to Draw Cash Advance (ADCA) shall be   supported by an approved AR or ATC and APP for the year of the office concerned, as well as the review and evaluation of the  Accounting   Division / Unit / Section on the   compliance with applicable rules and regulations on granting of cash advance. The ADCA shall be signed by the following DepEd officials:

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: F. SUB-ALLOTMENT RELEASE ORDER
texts.text: F. SUB-ALLOTMENT RELEASE ORDER

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Funds released by the DBM to the DepEd intended for the implementation of programs, projects or activities by DepEd field units shall be downloaded through a Sub-Allotment Release Order (Sub-ARO). No Sub-ARO shall be issued by the Budget Division / Unit without an approved Transfer / Downloading of Funds.
texts.text: Funds released by the DBM to the DepEd intended for the implementation of programs, projects or activities by DepEd field units shall be downloaded through a Sub-Allotment Release Order (Sub-ARO). No Sub-ARO shall be issued by the Budget Division / Unit without an approved Transfer / Downloading of Funds.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The Sub-ARO shall be signed by the following officials:
texts.text: The Sub-ARO shall be signed by the following officials:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: a. Of the amount transferred or downloaded by the Central Office to the RO, the SDO shall receive their funding requirement from the sub-ARO issued by the Regional Office concerned;
texts.text: Of the amount transferred or downloaded by the Central Office to the RO, the SDO shall receive their funding requirement from the sub-ARO issued by the Regional Office concerned;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: b From the Sub-ARO received from the RO, the SDO may further sub-allot the funding requirement of its School Implementing Unit. Provided, the Sub-ARO issued must not exceed the amount transferred or downloaded to the RO and SDO
texts.text: b From the Sub-ARO received from the RO, the SDO may further sub-allot the funding requirement of its School Implementing Unit. Provided, the Sub-ARO issued must not exceed the amount transferred or downloaded to the RO and SDO
